name: PeaceMakers The Video Game
description:
Year 202X

The world turned into a barren wasteland. The weak, innocent people ruled by gangs of bandits/raiders and warlords with deadly martial arts with their own law and order. However, the prayers of the people will be answered. Take controlled the Masubi Clan, a group of martial artist and fighters who sworn to be the protector and peace makers for humanity. Fight as the Masubi Clan leader and successor to Ninjutsu(Masaki), a ninja in the arts of Shadow Ninjutsu(Alec), a female archer with skills marksmanship(Dyana), or a nurse who learned the Ninjutsu of Healing(Kammy). Take on ruthless warlords with deadly martial arts with their army of bandits and soldiers who have sworn allegiance to the Blood of Vamp organization led by the Masaki's rival, King Vamp(aka Vladcula). Promised to save his kidnapped love, Nao, from his nemesis, will Masaki and his team succeed and save the people against the forces of evil or will the Blood of Vamp triumph against the clan and turn the wasteland into Hell? 

The Masubi Clan legend begins...

Controls to play the game:

-Arrow Keys/AWSD = move player

-Z/K = Attack(continuous taps for combo attacks)

-X/L = Item/Weapon pick up

-Hold Down X/L + Z/K = Crowdbreaking attack

-Spacebar = Jump

-Spacebar + Z/K = Jump attack

-Hold R/L Shift keys + Arrow/AWSD = run

-ESC = Open Pause Menu
